: : DeathStar : :

DeathStar: That's correct. We'll meet up with Major Tyrael's forces on Earth.

DeathStar continues his flight towards prehistoric Earth.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
In a little one-manned ship, another Tripredacus followed.

????: Hey Deathstar, ya leaving without me? That ain't fair! I wanna 
crush 'em too!

He was unmistakably techno-organic, but somehow, there was something 
strange to him. Since he wasn't a flyer, he had to take a ship, but 
he didn't care. The promise of action was far too appealing.

He was Clawstorm, the werewolf.

Clawstorm: Hey, we going to meet the major, right? That is where he 
is, on Earth?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Man, where is everyone? Have you all dropped off the edge of 
> Cybertron?
> 
> IC: : : Darkangel/DeathStar : :
> 
> Darkangel was waiting for a reply from Tripredacus command when his 
> optics move to Dreadplague. Was there something there? He was 
> studying her when he heard a voice comm over subspace.
> 
> Tripredacus Command, Cybertron: We have recieved your request agent 
> Drakangel. We are currently scrambling support troops. Your 
personal 
> request has already been met. Air Commander DeathStar is leaving as 
> we speak. Tripredacus Command, over and out.
> 
> On the surface of Cybertron a rather large group of Tripredacus 
> flyers is assembled. Addressing the group is a large black bot, who 
> looks to have an alt mode of a star fighter.
> 
> DeathStar: ... With that, I will be leaving you. General Arnot will 
> take over. I will be going to Earth to deal with our friends 
problems 
> in these... Beast Wars. I bid you farewell my troops. Vehical mode!
> 
> DeathStar transformes to his star fighter mode and blasts off 
towards 
> the transwarp rift, leaving Cybertron behind.
> 
> Back on Cybertron, General Arnot has started to speak, when 
suddenly, 
> an explosion shakes the area, terminating him. The flyers scramble.
> 
> Random Tripred Flyer #1: What in the name of Primus is going on?
> 
> Random Tripred Flyer #2: It's an attack! Must be the n....
> 
> Before the transformer can finish his sentence he is crushed as a 
> black and silver Earth semi-truck drives over him. Soon after, a 
> black and yellow Earth jet fires it's weapons, clearing the area, 
> before landing next to the truck. The attacking vehicals transform 
to 
> their robot modes.
> 
> Diesel: So much for the recon mission, eh, Razor?
> 
> Razor: Yeah, but it was more fun to blow them too bits, Diesel.
> 
> A clicking of weapons being primed, attracts Razor and Diesel's 
> attention again.
> 
> Random Tripred Flyer #3: Not all of us...
> 
> Razor draws his plasma rifle from subspace as Diesel ignites his 
> laser rod sword.
> 
> Razor: Diesel, old buddy, I think you may want to contact the rest 
of 
> the nWo...
> 
> OOC: I just thought that showing the nWo doing what I had them 
leave 
> Earth for, fighting the Tripredacus, would be cool. I'm not 
> reclaiming those chars or restarting the nWo.
